resources.string: Hitchhiker´s weather guide to extraterrestial space

• Martian weather API - Explore the martian weather and plan your extraterrestial visit accordingly! 
 
 • Shallow thought - An algorithm, no matter what input, outputting 42 (beta: might not be functioning at time of writing)

This part of our program is currently in its beta-version.\\n Our programmers are currently working on the advertised feature : An Algorithm that no matter the input outputs 42. Their labour has so far proved useless. \\n Until the product can be published in its finalized form we offer you this: An algorithm that no matter the question will output an answer, \"Shallow-thought-beta-version\".
